import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import random
import matplotlib.colors as mcolors
df = pd.read_csv('../input/videogamesales/vgsales.csv')
source.7d7ca767:
df1 = df.head(100)
ax = sns.countplot(x="Publisher", data=df1)

ax.set_xticklabels(ax.get_xticklabels(), rotation=40, ha="right")
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

source.f6fb908c: Most of the games in the dataset are action games.
source.e7a631d7: The publisher with the most of the best selling games in Japan is again, Nintendo.
source.55904d29: The best selling games in North America are shooter games.
source.95d53dcb: #  Analysis of sales in different regions of the world.
source.19cb4902: Amongst the top 100 ranked games of all time, more than half of them were published by Nintendo.
source.5fa8aba1: The brand with the most games amongst the best selling in North America is Nintendo.
source.afaf7475: The best selling games in Europe were made to be played on the PS3.
source.f9840184: Just like in North America, Nintendo appears to be the most succesful game publishing brand in Europe.
source.b0803cb7: The most popular gaming platform of all time in Japan is probably, the DS.
source.93cfe10f: This shows that most games in the dataset were released on the platforms - DS and PS2.
source.f772ddd5: This shows that the most famous platform of all time for the North American gamers is the xbox 360.
source.e7ffeebf: Shooter games are the most amongst the top 100, with respect to the Genres.
source.5a7a412a: The best selling genre of games in Europe is sports games.
source.7f5c52be: Most of the best selling games in Japan are role-playing games.
